promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic monkey normal-type pokemon wearing a ancient crystal headband. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Capuchystal, a a chibi young basic monkey normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Frighten Horn, Gripthrow. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "normal" or "Capuchystal". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, monkey-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: This playful creature, often found in community habitats, uses its Frighten Horn to startle rivals, then Gripthrows them to assert dominance.
